mapper.update:
update car_owner
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_info_id = #{carInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
msg_type = #{msgType,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_type = #{idcardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_no = #{idcardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resp_msg_id = #{respMsgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prv_id = #{prvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where car_owner_id = #{carOwnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update car_owner set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_info_id = #{carInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, msg_type = #{msgType,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_type = #{idcardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_no = #{idcardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resp_msg_id = #{respMsgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prv_id = #{prvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_owner_id = #{carOwnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM car_owner co WHERE co.task_id = #{taskId} AND co.car_info_id = #{carInfoId} AND co.msg_type = '1'
